typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(dummy = 1) ~> CreateDummyValue
CreateDummyValue window(over(dummy),
	asc(movie, true),
	id = sum(iif(Rating == 1, 1, 0))) ~> Window1
Window1 sort(asc(movie, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['title'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
